extendedInfo.description: K-Pop's most popular modern rock band comes to SHAKE Series! Meet the Korean Maroon5, CNBLUE in CNBLUE SHAKE featuring all of their new songs like 'In My Head' from their latest album [EAR FUN]! Download now and start SHAKING your Smart Phones! Meet Korean Maroon5 CNBLUE SHAKE! One of the most popular band in Asia, CNBLUE's music comes to iPhone! CNBLUEâs mega hit songs all included! Download now and get LIMITED TIME OFFER! ---------------------------------------------- Tap & Shake to the music! CNBLUE SHAKE offers traditional "TAPâstyle of gameplay as well as a new âSHAKE-WHEELâ mode, using a seamless-gesture technology developed by dooub. The âSHAKE-WHEELâ mode will make you feel like a DJ scratching the turntable! Introducing Card Deck System! CNBLUE SHAKE rewards you cards when you complete a game. These cards can be collected, which include unreleased pictures of CNBLUE, or they can be used in game like an item and receive higher scores! ---------------------------------------------- Contact Us Twitter @MusicianSHAKE Facebook www.facebook.com/CNBLUESHAKE

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I find the game addicting and I dont mind buying the full song since im a huge CNBlue fan . I enjoy listning to the songs I like as I play but its challenging as you keep going to extreme but its great. Also you can rank and try to beat other players scores. Love this game.
reviews.author: Jeannete Rodriguez

reviews.title: Jerky?
reviews.comment: I love the game, and I love CNBLUE, but is there a reason why it\'s so jerky unlike the iPhone version? Is it something with the Android version or the app or my devices? @v@; Because it makes gameplay rather difficult.
reviews.author: Eileen Lin

reviews.comment: hey . I can\'t play the shake one ..  When I click a song in the shake it\'s returning to home . how is it ? how can I play it ? I badly want to play it .. =_=

reviews.title: Used to be MAJOR fun..
reviews.comment: I had a great time playing this game..I don\'t mind buying songs to play too,since I\'m a HUGE fan of CNBLUE.But the thing is that they\'re songs that I can\'t play.Black Flower and Let\'s Go Crazy,for example.I\'ve bought that song,but whenever I try to play,it always came back to the game homescreen.Why is that?Please fix it a.s.ap..thanx a lot in advance..

reviews.title: Need a lot of time to download
